item.title: Alaska Airlines cuts 9 routes from San Francisco and LA in West Coast shake-up
item.description: Alaska Airlines is cutting flights out of some West Coast hubs, after a big expansion in Portland and San Diego announced last week.

item.title: 5 credit cards that save you money on streaming subscriptions
